body:
Mir: *deadpan* Fuck me.

Croix: Please put down the knife.

...It's like she's one part Kuudere and one part Yandere...

...KUYANDERE?

Very sexy and cute. I actually liked the dialogues and character interaction a lot, even in a non-perverted way. Such a shame there are so few translated Ar Tonelico doujinshi. If my Japanese ever becomes good enough, I would love to translate some myself. One more reason to keep learning...
this is so funny i forgot to fap XD beep
